title: Microsoft will take nearly a year to finish patching new 0-day Secure Boot bug
description: Fix will eventually render all kinds of older Windows boot media unbootable.

title: Chinese Mars rover sends back images of recent water-shaped crusts
description: Within the last million years or so, melted snow might have dampened Mars' sands.

title: OpenAI peeks into the “black box” of neural networks with new research
description: "We do not understand" how LLMs work, admits OpenAI in quest to make them interpretable.

title: Fairphone’s user-repairable headphones will offer spare parts through its app
description: But Fairphone doesn't know how long it will stock spare parts.

title: Google Fi takes the sting off the Pixel Fold price tag with $700 off
description: Your $700 arrives via 24 months of Google Fi credits.

title: Pharma company behind Shkreli’s infamous 4,000% price hike files for bankruptcy
description: Vyera will sell assets to cover debts.

title: EPA announces new rules to get carbon out of electricity production
description: Starting in the 2030s, stringent rules will radically cut emissions.

title: “Meaningful harm” from AI necessary before regulation, says Microsoft exec
description: "Did anybody suffer at least a thousand dollars' worth of damage" because of AI?

title: The AI race heats up: Google announces PaLM 2, its answer to GPT-4
description: PaLM 2 can code, translate, and "reason" in ways that best GPT-4, says Google.

title: Sony’s $1,400 phone has a “functional tactile design,” hits the US in July
description: The glass has a diamond-plate texture, and there's raised ribbing along the edges.

title: Ex-Ubiquiti engineer behind “breathtaking” data theft gets 6-year prison term
description: Engineer tried to claim that the hack was an “unsanctioned security drill.”

title: Lee Pace’s Brother Day is front and center in first teaser for Foundation S2
description: "Rejoice his shame remains unknown that he had almost sat a throne."

title: Disney+ and Hulu to unite in a single app this year
description: Disney plans to spend less on content, charge more for ad-free Disney+.

title: Rumors and retail listings point to the return of actual mid-range GPUs
description: Reports say we'll see RTX 4060 and RX 7600 GPUs before the month is out.

title: Wildfire smoke from Australia fueled three-year “super La Niña”
description: How wildfire smoke from Australia affected climate events around the world.

title: The Asus ROG Ally beats the Steam Deck at all but the most important things
description: New contender is a powerful portable PC that’s wantonly Windows.

title: Clever hybrid tech impresses with 40 mpg 2023 Honda CR-V Sport
description: The SUV uses Honda's fourth-generation two-motor hybrid system.

title: Leak of MSI UEFI signing keys stokes fears of “doomsday” supply chain attack
description: With no easy way to revoke compromised key, MSI is in a real pickle.
